title: Improve searchable PDF text layer placement
description: Current OCR text layer inserts lines at top-left. Use OCR bounding boxes/positions to place text closer to original layout and preserve page coordinates.

title: Acrobat-style searchable PDF OCR (word-level)
description: Implement near-Acrobat searchable PDF output by embedding a positioned, invisible text layer per word bounding box (English + Simplified Chinese), generated via background OCR jobs that persist across restarts. See docs/OCR_SEARCHABLE_PDF_PLAN.md.

title: Expose word-level OCR bounding boxes
description: Update OCR pipeline to return word text + bbox + confidence (English + Simplified Chinese), and plumb through backend APIs for PDF overlay.
notes: Implemented structured OCR geometry output plumbing: OcrManager now enables oar-ocr return_word_box and exposes recognize_image_word_boxes(); PDF OCR path now collects word boxes and groups into lines (core/ocr_grouping.rs). Added dev probes in src-tauri/examples/ocr_bbox_probe.rs + pdfium_rotate_probe.rs.

title: High-fidelity PDF coordinate mapping (CropBox/Rotate)
description: Implement bitmap→PDF coordinate transforms using MediaBox/CropBox and /Rotate so word boxes map accurately for invisible text overlay.
notes: Added CropBox/MediaBox + /Rotate extraction with inheritance via new helper core/pdf_page_geometry.rs, with unit tests; content.rs page_dimensions now uses extract_page_geometry() so PDFs with inherited MediaBox/Rotate are handled correctly.

title: Generate positioned invisible text layer with ToUnicode
description: Replace fixed-position text dump with Acrobat-style invisible text overlay using word bboxes. Must include: line aggregation to avoid PDF bloat, Unicode font embedding (EN+ZH) with mandatory subsetting, and ToUnicode CMap generation.
notes: Added dev-flagged mapped text layer: build_text_stream_from_ocr uses PageOcrResult + extract_page_geometry + ocr_pixel_to_pdf_point to place words/lines with Tr 3; new setting contentEnablePdfOcrTextLayerDev (default false) toggles mapped overlay; default path still plain text.

title: Background OCR job system with persistence
description: Add persisted background OCR job queue (progress/cancel/resume). Include guardrails: source exists check, write to *.partial + atomic rename, detect/delete stale partials, retry limits, and mark missing inputs as failed.

title: Tests + fixtures for Acrobat-style searchable PDFs
